snippet: The notion that stand-up is the last completely uncensored place has taken a beating online, but comedians believe in the importance of exploring limits.
abstract: Jason Zinoman discusses the risks faced by stand-up comics when confronting hecklers or joking about sensitive subjects.
lead_paragraph: The notion that stand-up is the last completely uncensored place has taken a beating online, but comedians believe in the importance of exploring limits.

headline.seo: When the Comic and the Heckler Both Take Offense
headline.main: Toe-to-Toe at the Edge of the Comedy Club Stage
headline.print_headline: Toe-to-Toe at the Edge of the Comedy Club Stage
